hero.title: Grow green — Live green with ECOLIA
hero.subtitle: Biodegradable plant pots made from corn cobs — environmentally friendly, adding nutrients to soil.

products.title: EcoGreen Product Line
products.subtitle: From seed starting to growing large plants, we have the right solution for every need

mini.name: EcoGreen Mini

standard.name: EcoGreen Standard

large.name: EcoGreen Large

process.title: Production Process
process.subtitle: From agricultural waste to finished products, every step is carefully controlled

collect.title: Collection
collect.description: Connect with farmers, collect corn cobs and coffee grounds from local farms.

process.title: Processing
process.description: Clean → Dry → Grind into raw material powder.

mold.title: Mixing & Molding
mold.description: Precise ratio control, compress to remove air, shape the pots.

test.title: Quality Testing
test.description: Test durability, biodegradation time, ensure quality standards.
